top_categories.workout_context: Nanaimo Unpaved rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Nanaimo Unpaved’s bc coastal, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Nanaimo Unpaved when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Nanaimo Unpaved. Make this intensity feel like home.
Racing Nanaimo Unpaved isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Nanaimo Unpaved’s bc coastal gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The varied gradients at Nanaimo Unpaved reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Nanaimo Unpaved’s bc coastal gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Nanaimo Unpaved — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Every session at Nanaimo Unpaved intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Nanaimo Unpaved — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Nanaimo Unpaved’s 3,500ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Nanaimo Unpaved’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Nanaimo Unpaved requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on bc coastal gravel to build confidence. Expect: bc coastal, local event, canadian gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 50 miles of bc coastal gravel in Nanaimo, British Columbia, Canada.
